question:
Consider the following statements about the Swavlamban Health Insurance Scheme:
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Women and Child Development
  2. The scheme provides specialist care to improve the health of pregnant women through regular free health check-ups
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because the scheme is an initiative under the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment. Second statement is again incorrect because the scheme aims to provide affordable Health Insurance to the persons with disabilities (PwDs).
